title: Back To Central City (Part 2)
body:
Back To Central City (Part 2)

Evan was startled when he saw Adam suddenly falling to the ground with shadow energy coming out from his body.

"Oy Adam" Evan tried to call Adam but the guy didn't respond to him.

Evan felt something was not right, he placed his hand on Adam's head and sent his shadow energy into his body once again.

He controlled his shadow energy and moved it towards Adam's soul orb that he saw earlier, and when he saw his soul orb, he finally understood what was happening.

"His soul is damaged.." Evan muttered in a low voice when he saw Adam's soul orb was filled with cracks.

But when he took a closer look, he was even more surprised because he could see a shallow layer of shadow energy was repairing Adam's soul orb.

He scanned the shallow layer of shadow energy that was repairing Adam's soul orb and realized the shadow energy that was repairing his soul orb was completely different from his normal shadow energy.
